> was ... not sword ... not arrow ... yes, you guessed it - thrown rocks!<=


I recall reference to a study regarding rocks used as projectiles. If "th=
rown" suggests hand-tossed rocks, how did they come to that conclusion and =
distinguish it from other sources, such as large bore weapons (including ar=
tillery) using rocks like canister?
